gobblin.data.management.copy.replication

Interface EndPoint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HadoopFsEndPoint, ReplicaHadoopFsEndPoint, SourceHadoopFsEndPoint

    public interface EndPoint
    Used to encapsulate all the information of a replica, including original source, during replication process.
    • Configuration of the data reside on this replica
    • Whether the replica is original source
    • The Watermark of this replica

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getEndPointName() 
      Collection<FileStatus> getFiles() 
      Optional<ComparableWatermark> getWatermark() 
      boolean isFileSystemAvailable() 
      boolean isSource() 

    • Method Detail

      • isSource

        boolean isSource()
        Returns:
        true iff this represents the original source

      • getEndPointName

        String getEndPointName()
        Returns:
        the end point name

      • getWatermark

        Optional<ComparableWatermark> getWatermark()
        Returns:
        the Watermark of the replica

      • isFileSystemAvailable

        boolean isFileSystemAvailable()
        Returns:
        whether this EndPoint is available to replica data

      • getFiles

        Collection<FileStatus> getFiles()
                         throws IOException
        Returns:
        all the FileStatuss of this EndPoint in the context of data replication
        Throws:
        IOException
